timeline.message: Deleted pacakge private Transform but move all context from it to Utility in the impl package

timeline.bodyText:
@srnagar Is this the same thing that management SDK's are doing too?
And you had some opinions to have a new model type for the exception rather than doing it this way?
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: as discussion in the TA meeting, this change looks good.
replies.author: mssfang

replies.bodyText: In toTextAnalyticsError .NET is using the top-level error to form the exception, but here we are using the innerError value if present.
replies.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText:
This is what python used to use innerError
https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-python/pull/11155/files#diff-6814e3aaeba6362738bfde592d65bd9bR64
replies.author: mssfang
